title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
**Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit: Unleash Your Full Potential**

Get ready to take your projects to the next level with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. This powerful and versatile kit is designed to help you tackle a wide range of applications, from drilling and driving screws to loosening stuck fasteners.

**Unbeatable Performance**

With its 300 UWO motor performance, this combo kit delivers unmatched power and speed. The DCD771 drill/driver features a compact and lightweight design, making it easy to maneuver in tight spaces. Its single sleeve ratcheting chuck allows for quick and easy bit changes, while the ergonomic handle provides superior comfort and control.

The DCF885 impact driver boasts a powerful 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips, perfect for heavy-duty applications. Its LED light ring provides superior visibility in dark environments, and its 1-handed loading design makes it easy to switch between bits quickly.

**Long-Lasting Power**

This combo kit includes two 20V Lithium Ion batteries, each with a high capacity for extended runtime. The included charger allows you to recharge your batteries quickly and efficiently.

**Additional Features**

* Superior visibility thanks to the LED foot light
* Compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry around
* Ergonomic handle provides superior comfort and control
* Single sleeve ratcheting chuck on drill/driver for quick bit changes
* 1-handed loading design on impact driver for easy switching between bits

**Package Contents**

* 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
* 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
* 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries
* 1x Charger

**Unleash Your Full Potential with DEWALT**

Don't settle for mediocre performance. Get the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and experience the power, speed, and convenience that only DEWALT can provide. Order now and start tackling your toughest projects like a pro!

**Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit: Unleash Your Full Potential**

Are you tired of being limited by your power tools? Do you need a reliable and versatile combo kit that can tackle a wide range of applications? Look no further! The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is here to revolutionize the way you work.

**Unbeatable Performance**

This combo kit features two powerful tools: the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver and the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver. With a maximum speed transmission of 15,000 RPM and 300 UWO motor performance, you'll be able to tackle even the toughest projects with ease.

**Compact and Lightweight Design**

The drill and impact driver are designed to be compact and lightweight, making them easy to maneuver in tight spaces and reducing fatigue on long jobs. The ergonomic handle provides superior comfort and control, allowing you to work for hours without feeling tired.

**3-LED Light Ring for Superior Visibility**

The DCF885 Impact Driver features a 3-LED light ring that provides superior visibility even in dark environments. With a delay time of 20 seconds, you'll be able to see exactly where you're working and avoid any potential hazards.

**2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries and Charger Included**

This combo kit comes with two 20V lithium-ion batteries and a charger, so you can start using your new tools right away. The batteries are designed to provide long-lasting power and quick charging times, so you won't be left waiting around for your tools to recharge.

**Wide Range of Applications**

Whether you're a professional contractor or a DIY enthusiast, this combo kit is perfect for a wide range of applications, including:

* Drilling and driving in wood, metal, and plastic
* Tightening loose screws and bolts
* Driving large screws and fasteners
* Tackling tough projects with ease

**Order Now and Experience the Power of DEWALT**

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Order the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and discover a new level of power, precision, and performance. With its unbeatable performance, compact design, and included batteries and charger, this combo kit is sure to become your go-to tool for any project.

**Order Now and Get:**

* DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
* DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
* 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries
* Charger
* 3-LED Light Ring
* Ergonomic Handle

**Limited Time Offer:** Get a free carrying case with your purchase of this combo kit. Don't miss out on this amazing deal! Order now and start working smarter, not harder.

Experience the power and versatility of this combo kit, designed to help you complete a wide range of projects with ease. **Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit - The Ultimate Power Tool for Any Job**

Are you looking for a reliable and versatile power tool that can handle any job, from drilling to driving? Look no further than the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. This comprehensive kit includes two powerful tools: the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver and the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver.

**Drill/Driver - Unleash Your Power**

The DCD771 is a compact and lightweight drill that packs a punch with its high-torque motor, delivering up to 300 UWO of power. With its single sleeve ratcheting chuck, you can easily switch between bits without having to remove the bit from the drill. The ergonomic handle provides maximum comfort and control, making it perfect for extended use.

**Impact Driver - Drive with Precision**

The DCF885 is a compact and lightweight impact driver that is designed for one-handed loading and accepts 1-inch bit tips. With its powerful motor, you can drive up to 3,250 RPM and deliver up to 2,800 in-lbs of torque. The LED light ring provides superior visibility, illuminating your work area even in dark spaces.

**Kit Includes**

**Intended Use**

This combo kit is perfect for a wide range of applications, including:

* Construction
* Carpentry
* Automotive
* DIY projects

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Choose the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit for your next project. Order now and experience the power and precision that DEWALT is known for!

**Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit**

Take your power tool game to the next level with this unbeatable combo kit from DEWALT. The DCK240C2 features two powerful tools in one package: the compact and lightweight DCD771 drill/driver and the compact and lightweight DCF885 impact driver.

**Unbeatable Performance**

The DCD771 drill/driver packs a punch with its 300 UWO motor performance, delivering up to 15,000 RPM for maximum drilling speed. Its ergonomic handle provides superior comfort and control, while its single sleeve ratcheting chuck accepts 1/2-inch bits for effortless bit changes.

**Impressive Impact**

The DCF885 impact driver is designed for heavy-duty applications, with a powerful motor that delivers up to 2,800 RPM and 3,250 in-lbs of torque. Its compact size (5.55 inches front to back) and lightweight design (2.8 lbs) make it easy to maneuver, while its 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips for added convenience.

**Long-Lasting Power**

Both tools are powered by two high-capacity 20V Lithium-Ion batteries, providing extended runtime and reducing downtime. The included charger ensures quick and efficient recharging.

**Additional Features**

The DCK240C2 combo kit also features a superior LED foot light for improved visibility in dark spaces, as well as a compact design that fits easily into tight spaces.

**What's Included**

* 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
* 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
* 2x 20V Lithium-Ion Batteries
* 1x Charger

**Upgrade Your Toolbox Today**

Don't settle for anything less. The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is the perfect choice for professionals and DIYers alike, offering unparalleled performance, versatility, and value.

Order now and experience the power of DEWALT!
